feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -26.3°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
